answers.answer: Hi, there are few causes for numbeness and tingling sensation in the lower limbs. This could be due to a neuropathy or decreased calcium levels in blood. Neuropathy is usually associated with diabetes or vitamin B complex deficiency. Please get few about tests done to see where lies the abnormality. Regards

question: For 2 months now I feel a slight tingling and then numbness, like a novocaine shot, in my lower thigh AFTER walking 10 minutes.  If I stop, the sensation stops.  Then I can walk around and all is fine.  I have to have a sustained time walking for this to occur. Any ideas?
title: Thigh tingling & numbness
